alert.note: Alert for Garfield (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 04 at 10:45PM MDT until July 05 at 4:00AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Montana, including the following county, Garfield. * WHEN...Until 300 AM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1045 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Cohagen and Hillside. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
